channel.title: Alert message when alert is triggered
channel.description: Is there a way to personalize the message sent via email when an alert is triggered?

item.title: Alert message when alert is triggered
item.dc:creator: Swaroop
item.description:
We can send personalised emails or even whatsapp messages through other tools like locale.ai . Can we see integrations like whatsapp or Zendesk in future ?

Read full topic
item.source: Alert message when alert is triggered

item.title: Alert message when alert is triggered
item.dc:creator: agnoldo
item.description:
Ok, @jesse, thanks for your fast response!

Read full topic
item.source: Alert message when alert is triggered

item.title: Alert message when alert is triggered
item.dc:creator: jesse
item.description:
The reason is it’s not ready yet. @ranbena’s awesome alert overhaul opened eleven days ago. We alpha testers just got our hands on it and the V8 release is imminent.

Read full topic
item.source: Alert message when alert is triggered

item.title: Alert message when alert is triggered
item.dc:creator: agnoldo
item.description:
Hi @ranbena, great job, thanks! I’ve noticed that many people need this rebuild on Alert Notifications (there are lots of feature requests related to this here on Discuss). Is there any particular technical reason for this feature not be included in Redash v8?

Read full topic
item.source: Alert message when alert is triggered

item.title: Alert message when alert is triggered
item.dc:creator: ranbena
item.description:
Discussed in Alert Notifications and eventually landed with https://github.com/getredash/redash/pull/4170. Planned for release in Redash v9.

Read full topic
item.source: Alert message when alert is triggered

item.title: Alert message when alert is triggered

item.description:
At the moment not, although this is something we would love to add in the future.
